data.title: SpectraONE Launched to Redefine AI in Supply Chain
data.description: ATLANTA, December 02, 2025--SpectraONE, a new AI-driven supply chain platform, has officially launched, offering a smarter, faster path to predictive planning for global supply chain teams. Designed for real-world complexity, SpectraONE delivers modular AI features that help operations teams move from reactive to proactive without waiting months for results or overhauling their core systems.
data.keywords: anomaly detection, demand forecasting, inventory optimization, operations teams, supply chain, predictive planning, BUSINESS WIRE, explainability
